definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: A mathematical model for optimizing topological design of local-area networks is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了计算机局域网优化设计问题的数学模型。

sentences.english: For a home network, it can't be beat.
sentences.chinese: 例如在一个家庭局域网中的使用就无人能敌。

sentences.english: Orange is your DMZ, and Purple is your wireless LAN.
sentences.chinese: 橙色的是隔离区，而紫色代表无线局域网。

sentences.english: Enhance and maintain LANs and WANs to ensure proper level of service.
sentences.chinese: 提高和维护局域网和广域网，以确保服务的权限。

sentences.english: Step 6 The LES allows or disallows the client to join the emulated LAN.
sentences.chinese: LES允许或拒绝客户加入仿真局域网。

sentences.english: All our office computers are not on a local are nota network.
sentences.chinese: 咱们自己搞里所有的计算机都在局域网上。

sentences.english: All our office computers are on a local area network.
sentences.chinese: 我们公司里所有的计算机都在局域网上。

sentences.english: In this paper, an optimal routing algorithm is given for the bidirectional double-loop LAN.
sentences.chinese: 给出了双向双环局域网络的一个最优路由算法。

sentences.english: We hope that, after the upbuilding of LAN, the company can improve its working efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 希望局域网建成之后，能帮该公司提高工作效率。

sentences.english: Sniffing WLAN straightly threatens the safety of WLAN.
sentences.chinese: 嗅探无线局域网直接威胁网络安全。

sentences.english: So it's very necessary to develop a software which based on instant-message in LAN.
sentences.chinese: 因此开发一个局域网的即时通信工具是非常有必要的。

sentences.english: Wireless local-area network (WLAN) is an important part in computer networks.
sentences.chinese: 无线局域网是计算机网络的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: An ATM network can support multiple independent emulated LANs.
sentences.chinese: ATM网络可以支持多个单独的仿真局域网。

sentences.english: LAN will become the backplane in system-ready LXI instruments.
sentences.chinese: 局域网将成为系统就绪LXI仪器的基础。

sentences.english: Fiber optics are becoming increasingly more common for use with Local-Area Networks (LANs).
sentences.chinese: 光缆在局域网领域的使用越来越普遍。

sentences.english: A scheme of IPX protocol of local network is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中提出了基于IPX协议的录波器局域网实现方案。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
